experience.title: Cast member (actor-singer) and writer for the RealAD Show 2018
experience.description: RealAD is a musical that was spearheaded by Elizabeth Swados, a Tony Award nominated musician, writer, and theatre director. As a cast member and writer in this production, I spent 3 months developing the script and rehearsing at the NYU Tisch School of the Arts. We performed the musical in 2018 to an audience of 500+ people in Abu Dhabi.

education.title: New York University Abu Dhabi
education.degree: Bachelor of Arts - BA Cum Laude, University Honors Scholar
education.description: Received a full scholarship ($300,000 over 4 years) from New York University to pursue my undergrad at NYU Abu Dhabi, a selective liberal arts college with an acceptance rate < 4%. Fully-funded semesters and J-terms across New York City, Abu Dhabi, London, Buenos Aires and Athens.

honors_and_awards.title: Jury Special Mention Award
honors_and_awards.description: Won the Jury Special Mention Award in the International Competition category for 'The Silenced Siren', a short documentary that I directed and edited in 2015.

honors_and_awards.title: Golden Elephant Award for Best Film
honors_and_awards.description: Wrote, directed, and edited a short documentary, The Silenced Siren, about the history of the erstwhile textile mill area of Mumbai. Won the Best Film Award in the youth category of the ICFFI, 2015.
